extendedInfo.description: Jigsaw Guru Free is a relaxing jigsaw puzzle game,  with some useful helps for players having a hard time finishing a puzzle, or wanting an easier experience. Very casual, with no time limit, you can save whenever you want, and pick up where you left off. Depending on the difficulty level you choose, a game can last between a minute and a whole hour, and you may have to use the zoom functionality to look at different parts of the picture. Last but not least, Jigsaw Guru Free allows you to play with any photo on your phone, for even more hours of fun.

reviews.title: So stupid!
reviews.comment: Its basically a slider puzzle..you slide the pieces around trying to make them fit. Not like a real jigsaw at all!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love this game.
reviews.comment: I especially like being able to use my own pics for game play. Is a bit buggy though. Does freeze a lot and rotating pieces freezes even more. Thanks for sharing shug.
reviews.author: Grammy Anon

reviews.comment: Worst app ever game froze up the frist 7 seconds!
reviews.author: A Google User
